breaking.title: 🔥 Breaking Changes
breaking.description: For changes that affect backwards compatibility

feature.title: 🥂 New Features
feature.description: For new features that do not break compatibility

fix.title: 🦗 Bug Fixes
fix.description: For changes that fix a bug

documentation.title: 📘 Documentation
documentation.description: For changes that deal with project documentation

maintenance.title: ⛏️ Maintenance
maintenance.description: For changes that affect project dependencies, configuration files, etc.
